subject: Standing Operating Procedure (SOP) for Implementation of Rate Analysis for Bow String Girder
text: #Ray 775 rTHrf gferazro (Tsq5 GRde7 &1r rTHRf 4ART4, ARG TaR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) Hqya T vil-5 & 6, #acr-10, ERd5, #f @vaft 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-- Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 TM/Phone 91-11-25074100 25074200 NHAI/ Policy Guidelines/ Standard Documents/ 2024 Policy Circular No.11.64/ 2024 dated 30th December, 2024 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. DESIGN-12038/2/2024-Design Division (Comp. No. 254047)} Sub: Standing Operating Procedure (SOP) for Implementation of Rate Analysis for Bow String Girder- reg: Please refer NHAI Policy Circular No. 11.59/ 2024 dated 24.07.2024 vide which the Standing Operating Procedure (SOP) for Implementation of Rate Analysis for Bow String Girder has been issued. 2 The Rate Analysis for driving the rate for 'Providing Structural Steel for Super- Structure complete as per drawing and Technical Specifications is available in MoRT&H Standard Data Book for Analysis of Rates (2019) at Sr. No. 14.26. Accordingly, Policy Circular No. 11.59/2024 dated 24.07.2024 shall be treated as Withdrawn / Cancelled. 3. This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. 3dl12l24 (CS. Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord:) To: AlI Officers of NHAI HQ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1_ Hindi Division for translation in Hindi. 2_ Library for hosting the circular on library site. 3_ Web Admin for circulation. 'M T T 9 NHAL 10, Copy
